body_content.explanation: an area in a field of crops where the crops have been made flat in a regular pattern, often a circle or series of circles, which people sometimes believe has been done by aliens (= creatures from a different planet):
examples: The picture shows him standing in a mysterious 15-foot-wide crop circle in his soybean field.
A crop circle expert who spent three days studying those circles concluded they were caused by some unexplained natural phenomenon.
